signals.title_ko: 에이전트 간 탈옥 공격: 강화학습을 통한 검증 가능한 Agent-to-Agent Jailbreaking
signals.title_en: David vs. Goliath: Verifiable Agent-to-Agent Jailbreaking via Reinforcement Learning
signals.key_finding: Tag-Along Attacks achieve 67% success against safety-aligned models, transferable to closed-source

signals.title_ko: 검증 위기: GenAI 허위정보에 대한 전문가 인식과 재현 가능한 출처 증명
signals.title_en: The Verification Crisis: Expert Perceptions of GenAI Disinformation and the Case for Reproducible Provenance
signals.key_finding: Expert survey shows large-scale text generation poses systemic epistemic risk

signals.title_ko: AI 생성 데이터 오염이 병리학적 변이성과 진단 신뢰성을 침식
signals.title_en: AI-generated Data Contamination Erodes Pathological Variability and Diagnostic Reliability
signals.key_finding: Synthetic medical data causes false reassurance rates tripling

signals.title_ko: GRACE: 규범적 단일체 행위자 해체를 위한 이유 기반 신경-기호 아키텍처
signals.title_en: Breaking Up with Normatively Monolithic Agency with GRACE: A Reason-Based Neuro-Symbolic Architecture for Safe and Ethical AI Alignment
signals.key_finding: Decouples normative reasoning from instrumental decision-making

signals.title_ko: 다중 에이전트 AI 시스템의 자기 진화 조정 프로토콜
signals.title_en: Self-Evolving Coordination Protocol in Multi-Agent AI Systems
signals.key_finding: Externally validated self-modification with Byzantine fault tolerance for regulated domains

signals.title_ko: Sycophancy에서 Sensemaking으로: 인간-AI 의사결정을 위한 Premise Governance
signals.title_en: From Sycophancy to Sensemaking: Premise Governance for Human-AI Decision Making
signals.key_finding: Fluent agreement without calibrated judgment risks poor decisions

signals.title_ko: 인간 사회 영감의 에이전트 AI 보안 접근법: 4C Framework
signals.title_en: Human Society-Inspired Approaches to Agentic AI Security: The 4C Framework
signals.key_finding: Core, Connection, Cognition, Compliance governance framework for agentic AI

signals.title_ko: LLM의 전략적 예측: 완전 전향적 벤처 토너먼트의 증거
signals.title_en: The Strategic Foresight of LLMs: Evidence from a Fully Prospective Venture Tournament
signals.key_finding: Tests if AI can outperform humans at strategic foresight via prospective tournament

signals.title_ko: 동기, 주의, 시각적 플랫폼 디자인: 도덕적 전염이 TikTok과 Instagram에서 확산되는 방식
signals.title_en: Motivation, Attention, and Visual Platform Design: How Moral Contagions Spread on TikTok and Instagram
signals.key_finding: TikTok algorithm enabled viral moralized political content spread

signals.title_ko: 구조적 해악으로서의 미학: 텍스트-이미지 생성에서의 알고리즘적 외모주의
signals.title_en: Aesthetics as Structural Harm: Algorithmic Lookism Across Text-to-Image Generation
signals.key_finding: Systematic infrastructure compounding inequalities through AI systems

signals.title_ko: 알고리즘 채용의 사후 시장 공정성 모니터링을 위한 다자간 연산 프로토콜
signals.title_en: Multi-party Computation Protocols for Post-Market Fairness Monitoring in Algorithmic Hiring
signals.key_finding: Operationalizing EU AI Act fairness requirements via MPC

signals.title_ko: 질문하는 언어에 따라: LLM 분석에서의 언어 조건부 이데올로기적 분기
signals.title_en: The Language You Ask In: Language-Conditioned Ideological Divergence in LLM Analysis
signals.key_finding: Prompt language produces systematically different ideological outputs

signals.title_ko: 기계가 틀릴 때: LLM이 인간보다 자폐증 미신을 더 많이 영속시킴
signals.title_en: When Machines Get It Wrong: Large Language Models Perpetuate Autism Myths More Than Humans Do
signals.key_finding: Human participants endorsed fewer myths than LLMs

signals.title_ko: 얽힌 인간-AI 상호작용에서 인지-행동 표류를 탐색하기 위한 메타인지 강화

signals.key_finding: Subjective confidence increases without gains in epistemic reliability

signals.title_ko: 충돌하는 목표를 위한 보상 없는 정렬
signals.key_finding: Aligning LLMs with multiple conflicting human objectives simultaneously without reward functions
